Overview Chapter

class CGOBSlider

Constructors and Destructors
CGOBSliderSet default values.
Operations
GetXPos Get X and Y value.
GetYPos
IsHorizontal
IsVertical Check if slider is vertical or horizontal.
SetHorizontal
SetOffset Set offset.
SetRange Sets the range of values of slider.
SetThumbPos Set the position of the thumb.
SetThumbSize Set the thumb dimensions.
SetVertical Set vertical flag for vertical or horizontal.
Overridables
MoveMoves slider and thumb along with it.
OnDraw
OnLBDown
OnLBUp
OnMouseMove
Data Members
protected
RECT m_rcThumb;Dimensions of the thumb.
private
BOOL m_IsVertical;Flag specifies if slider is vertical or horizontal in nature.
INT16 m_ThumbWidth, m_ThumbHeight;Thumb width and height.
INT32 m_nMin, m_nMax;Sliders min and maximum values.
INT32 m_nXPos, m_nYPos;Sliders x and y position. This is thumb position value.
INT32 m_xOffset, m_yOffset;Thumb x,y offset.
